    First Lunch of 2017

    The first lunch meeting of Spring 2017 happened on Wednesday, February 1. We presented CSWomen Travel Grant program and introduced new officers.

    Graduate co-chair: Nidhi Mundra
    MS co-chair: Eva Moscovici
    Social committee: Katherine Keith, Amee Trivedi, and Roopa Shenoy
